DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate whether the tolerability of SCA-136 is improved by dosing with food or by increasing dose amounts in a step-wise fashion.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating SCA-136 Tolerability With Dose Titration and Food
DOC.criteria: Healthy men or women, aged 18 to 50 years Abnormal vital signs, ECG, or lab results
